MobSF /

      Mobile-Security-Framework-MobSF---Mobile Security Framework (MobSF) is an automated, all-in-one mobile application (Android/iOS/Windows) pen-testing, malware analysis and security assessment framework capable of performing static and dynamic analysis.

GitSquared /

      edex-ui---A cross-platform, customizable science fiction terminal emulator with advanced monitoring & touchscreen support.

mxrch /

      GHunt---🕵️‍♂️ Investigate Google Accounts with emails.

l1ving /

      youtube-dl---A fork of youtube-dl, for archival purposes.

google /

      ExoPlayer---An extensible media player for Android

koutto /

      pi-pwnbox-rogueap---Homemade Pwnbox 🚀 / Rogue AP 📡 based on Raspberry Pi — WiFi Hacking Cheatsheets + MindMap 💡

gto76 /

      python-cheatsheet---Comprehensive Python Cheatsheet

hoffstadt /

      DearPyGui---Dear PyGui: A Bloat-free Graphical User Interface for Python with minimal dependencies

algorithm-visualizer /

      algorithm-visualizer---🎆Interactive Online Platform that Visualizes Algorithms from Code

harisqazi1 /

      Cybersecurity---This is meant to assist people looking for entry level Cybersecurity jobs, as well as study up on skills that they can put on their resume.

AMAI-GmbH /

      AI-Expert-Roadmap---Roadmap to becoming an Artificial Intelligence Expert in 2020

fireeye /

      ThreatPursuit-VM---Threat Pursuit Virtual Machine (VM): A fully customizable, open-sourced Windows-based distribution focused on threat intelligence analysis and hunting designed for intel and malware analysts as well as threat hunters to get up and running quickly.

sogou /

      workflow---C++ Programming Paradigm with Asynchronous Networking

Qovery /

      engine---Deploy your apps on any Cloud providers in just a few seconds

erluxman /

      awesomefluttertips---❤️Flutter ❤️ tips and tricks ❤️ Awesome Flutter ❤️ tips and tricks ❤️

jofpin /

      trape---People tracker on the Internet: OSINT analysis and research tool by Jose Pino

hantmac /

      Mastering_Go_ZH_CN---《Mastering GO》中文译本，《玩转 GO》。

jakevdp /

      PythonDataScienceHandbook---Python Data Science Handbook: full text in Jupyter Notebooks

xingshaocheng /

      architect-awesome---后端架构师技术图谱

bradtraversy /

      design-resources-for-developers---Curated list of design and UI resources from stock photos, web templates, CSS frameworks, UI libraries, tools and much more

developer-resources /

      frontend-development---A curated list of resources for Frontend development

PaddlePaddle /

      PaddleX---PaddlePaddle Entire Process Development Toolkit（『飞桨』深度学习全流程开发工具）

samyk /

      slipstream---NAT Slipstreaming allows an attacker to remotely access any TCP/UDP services bound to a victim machine, bypassing the victim’s NAT/firewall, just by the victim visiting a website

MisterBooo /

      LeetCodeAnimation---Demonstrate all the questions on LeetCode in the form of animation.（用动画的形式呈现解LeetCode题目的思路）

apache /

      incubator-superset---Apache Superset is a Data Visualization and Data Exploration Platform
